items.title: WATCH:  Man joins his wife as ‘Jeopardy!’ champion
items.description: Maine real estate agent Jason Singer, who won last night’s episode, is married to Susan McMillan, who took home the title in 2021.

items.title: Thousands of Philadelphia city workers on strike but judge orders some back to work
items.description: A strike being staged by nearly 10,000 city workers in Philadelphia has entered its second day
